name: The Darkest Night (M1estere)
description:
This game is a prequel to my previous game "The Legend of the Night".

In this game you take a control of a great warrior, whose goal is to stop evil forces.

Make your way to the final of the game, find all the secrets.

Apart from main levels there are challenge levels, where you can test your skills, and also there is a shooting gallery, where you can train for your future battles.

The controls are pretty simple, so it is not really hard to get used to them.

Go on, save the world!
